author: Kozejin
install_msg:
Thank you for installing AutoVoice!
Type `[p]help AutoVoice` to get started.
name: AutoVoice
short: Create automatic voice channels when members join a channel.
description: Automatically create a personal voice channel just for you when you join a specific channel. Your channel disappears once you leave, keeping things neat and organized.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store user data.
